name: @parca/grafana-panel
description: A Grafana panel plugin for Parca

scripts.bundle: rm -rf dist && yarn build && yarn sign && mv dist parca-panel && zip release/parca-panel-plugin-0.0.36.zip parca-panel -r && rm -rf parca-panel && sha1sum release/parca-panel-plugin-0.0.36.zip

author: Parca Contributors
